T02D1468:48a-1: shr'i tsa kra samba ra hasta p'u dzi bidhi n'a ma /
T02D1468:48a-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lag mchod kyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1468:48a-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1468:48a-5: rnal 'byor ma yi gtso mo ni //
T02D1468:48a-6: rdo rje phag mo la btud de //
T02D1468:48a-7: bdag gi lag pa'i mchod pa yi //
T02D1468:48a-8: cho ga man ngag bzhin du bsdu /
T02D1468:48a-9: de la tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs par dpal
T02D1468:48a-10: 'khor lo bde mchog gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i
T02D1468:48a-11: sngags pas lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang mdzub
T02D1468:48a-12: mo dang gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung
T02D1468:48a-13: dang de dag gi sen mo rnams su rdo rje
T02D1468:48b-0: sems dpa' dang rnam par snang @48b mdzad dang /
T02D1468:48b-1: 'od dpag med dang mi bskyod pa dang rin chen
T02D1468:48b-2: 'byung ldan dang don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin can
T02D1468:48b-3: gyi go rims ji lta bar dkar po dang ser
T02D1468:48b-4: po dang dmar po dang nag po dang /
T02D1468:48b-11: phat ham zhes bya pa'i yi ge rnams dgod do //
T02D1468:48b-12: lag pa'i mthil du yang skad cig gis grub pa'i
T02D1468:48b-13: padma dmar po 'dab ma lnga pa bsgoms la de'i
T02D1468:48b-14: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g-yon skor du
T02D1468:48b-15: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin ya mi n'i dang
T02D1468:48b-16: rmongs byed ma dang skyod byed ma dang 'jigs byed
T02D1468:48b-17: ma dang tsandi ka'i rang bzhin can nag po dang
T02D1468:48b-18: dkar po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang du
T02D1468:48b-24: ces pa'i ye ge rnams dang /
T02D1468:48b-25: lte ba la ni rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin
T02D1468:48b-26: kha dog dmar mo aom bam zhes bya ba'i sa
T02D1468:48b-28: lag pa'i bol la yang 'di dag nyid kyi gzugs
T02D1468:48b-29: brnyan nam 'khor lo gsum yongs su rdzogs par blta
T02D1468:48b-30: bar bya'o // de nas lag pa la gnas pa'i
T02D1468:48b-31: 'byung bas dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam
T02D1468:48b-32: mkha' rnams ltung byed ma dang gsod byed ma dang
T02D1468:48b-34: gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D1468:48b-35: padma'i dra ba can gyi rang bzhin du lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D1468:48b-36: de nas lag pa la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi
T02D1468:48b-37: yi ge dag la khu ba'i rdzas kyis byugs te
T02D1468:48b-38: lag mthil de dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams
T02D1468:48b-39: cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'khor lo gsum gyi
T02D1468:48b-40: rang bzhin du lhag par mos par byas nas khu
T02D1468:48b-41: pa la sogs pa'i rdzas de yi ge gsum gyi
T02D1468:48b-42: sngags sam rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis dbul bar
T02D1468:48b-43: bya'o // de nas yang dag par mchod nas cho
T02D1468:48b-44: ga lhag pa dang ma tshang ba dag par bya
T02D1468:48b-45: ba'i don du yi ge brgya pa'i sngags bton te
T02D1468:48b-46: bya'o // / tshogs kyi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab
T02D1468:48b-47: pa'i don du gsol ba btab nas rdzas gzhan nam
T02D1468:48b-48: yang na de ma yin pa gzhan du gzhag ste
T02D1468:48b-49: bya'o // / / lag pa'i mthil du sbyar ba'i
T02D1468:48b-50: rdzas srin lag gis blangs pa las snying ga dang
T02D1468:48b-51: lte ba dang mgo rnams su yi ge h'um dang
T02D1468:48b-52: a'a: dang aom brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas byugs
T02D1468:48b-53: pa na lha'i tshogs de dag bdag nyid la zhugs
T02D1468:49a-2: cho ga 'di yang kun spyod pa'i rgyud dang 'brel ba yin no //
T02D1468:49a-3: lag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1468:49a-4: yang na sngar brjod pa'i chogs sbyangs pa'i lag pa
T02D1468:49a-5: g-yon pa'i srin lag gis gnas dang nye ba'i gnas
T02D1468:49a-6: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du pu dz'a zhes bya
T02D1468:49a-7: ba la sogs pa'i yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D1468:49a-8: brjod cing ji ltar sbyangs pa'i chang gis gru gsum
T02D1468:49a-9: gnyis byugs nas de'i dbus su yang dkyil 'khor zlum
T02D1468:49a-10: po'o // de rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las
T02D1468:49a-11: byung ba'o 'od zer gyis rten dang brten pa'i dkyil
T02D1468:49a-12: 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das bkug par bsams
T02D1468:49a-13: po'o // te / de la bdud rtsi lnga la
T02D1468:49a-14: sogs pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa'i bza' ba dang
T02D1468:49a-15: bca' ba la sogs pa yi ge gsum ma ma
T02D1468:49a-16: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis phul nas padma'i snod
T02D1468:49a-17: la gnas pa'i chang bdud rtsir bsgrubs pa srin lag
T02D1468:49a-18: dang mthe bos blangs te bcom ldan 'das dang bcom
T02D1468:49a-19: ldan 'das ma la rang rang gi snying po dang
T02D1468:49a-20: nye ba'i snying po dag gis dang /
T02D1468:49a-21: mkha' 'gro ma nas brtsams te gshin rje 'dzoms ma'i
T02D1468:49a-22: mthar thug pa rnams la yang 'di rnams nyid kyi
T02D1468:49a-23: rang rang gi sngags ji lta bdag gis tshim par
T02D1468:49a-24: bya'o // de nas yang dag par mchod nas ma
T02D1468:49a-25: tshang ba dang lhag pa dag par bya pa'i don
T02D1468:49a-26: du yi ge brgya pa bton nas tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1468:49a-27: lo byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba gdab
T02D1468:49a-28: bya'o // pa'o // aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1468:49a-29: zhes brjod bzhin par padma bskor pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes
T02D1468:49a-30: par bya ste phyag rgya de sdud pa na 'khyud
T02D1468:49a-31: pa'i stangs ka sngon du 'gro bas srin lag gis
T02D1468:49a-32: sa la reg cing aom badzra mu:/
T02D1468:49a-33: zhes brjod pas gshegs su gsol te /
T02D1468:49a-34: 'khor lo de bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1468:49a-35: de nas sa de la gnas pa'i chang lag pa
T02D1468:49a-36: g-yon pa'i srin lag gis blangs nas des snying ga
T02D1468:49a-37: dang lce dang mgo rnams su yi ge h'um dang
T02D1468:49a-38: aa: dang aom brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas byug
T02D1468:49a-39: cing lag pa de la gnas pa'i lha'i 'khor lo
T02D1468:49a-40: yang bdag nyid la gzhug par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1468:49a-41: grub gsum dkyil 'khor lo gnas pa /
T02D1468:49a-42: mgon po 'khor lo bde mchog la //
T02D1468:49a-43: lag pas mchod pa bshad pa 'di //
T02D1468:49b-0: rnal 'byor pa la phan @49b byed yin //
T02D1468:49b-1: lag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga dpal pradzny'a rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1468:49b-3: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal su ma ti k'i rti dang /
